it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.listeners

Class EndlessRecyclerViewScrollListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
      • it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.listeners.EndlessRecyclerViewScrollListener

  • public abstract class EndlessRecyclerViewScrollListener
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
    Scroll listener that allows to load more data in a list when the user scrolls down
